#summary Showcase implemented with EJB + Mojarra (JSF)
= Technologies = 

== View ==
 * JSF 2.0 (Mojarra)

== Service ==
 * EJB 3.1

== Persistence == 
 * JPA 2.0


= Start up help =

== Prerequisites ==
 * JDK 6
 * Maven > 2.2

== Steps ==
 # [http://code.google.com/p/coolcoders-showcase/source/checkout Checkout] project.
 # Go into Folder "showcase/web/jsf/jsf-mojarra-ejb"
 # execute "mvn clean package embedded-glassfish:run"
 # Open "http://localhost:8080/showcase-mojarra" in a browser.
